text: Falsirhodobacter halotolerans is a Gram-negative bacteria bacterium from the genus of Falsirhodobacter which has been isolated from soil from a solar saltern from Humma in India. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Falsirhodobacter halotolerans at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Rhodobacteraceae Category:Bacteria described in 2013
title: Falsirhodobacter halotolerans
